Love and obedience or, Christs precept and promise. Being a sermon preached on Whitsunday last, 28 of May, 1637. in Guild-hall chappell, before the right honorable the Lord Major of this city of London. Freake, William
[4] 18 p.
Printed by Iohn Okes dwelling in little-Saint Bartholomewes., London: : 1637.
Headpiece, initials. Signatures: A², B-C⁴, D¹. Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
